title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description:
When modifying parameters in the dialog, the following issues were identified: 

- The name validation is duplicated on the first page. 
- The first and second columns should be merged. 

The bug report is missing an observation (OB) statement, please provide a clear and complete observation statement.
EB:
The spacing between the button and list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the top of the dialog. 

The table should have a label to support the use of a mnemonic. 

Multiple selection should be allowed, as the 'move up' and 'move down' actions can be applied to more than one item. 

The signature preview must be a label that wraps the text. Additionally, it would be beneficial if the signature preview had the background color set to the same color as the hover effect. 

When modifying a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
SR: Please ensure that the preview properly displays the full parameter name even when it is very long.
